description: Ocean breeze, paella sunsets and Valencian rhythms — a seaside soundtrack for golden days.

items.name: La Malvarrosa Beach
items.description: Distance from the city center: 6.7 km

items.name: Playa Malvarrosa
items.description: Distance from the city centre: 7.8 KmAn urban beach situated on the north region, this beach is wide and has plenty of white sand to give you all the feels of a beach vacation! There are multiple services provided on the promenade here and it is also amongst the best Valencia beaches known for its serene vibes around!

items.name: Playa El Portet
items.description: Distance from the city centre: 126.4 KmApproximately 20 metres wide and 350 meters long, this charming beach is amongst the favourites of all the tourists in Spain. Also called as one of the best beaches in Valencia, Spain, Playa El Portet has crystal clear waters splashing across the fine texture of the sand at the beach. The west end of this beach joins to Moraira Yacht Club, if you wish to soak in more serenity and peace here.

items.name: Levante Beach
items.description: Distance from the city centre: 147 KmIf you wish to enjoy the best of summer season in Spain, this beach has all the facilities for it. Be it the hammocks, a playground for children to have fun with the sand, this beach has all the vibes of a luxurious close beach and is also the main beach of the town of Benidorm.
